  • Housing in the CTP

Housing and physical environment

Vision: All residents have access to quality housing, infrastructure, and neighborhood spaces that promote community cohesion and are affordable

2020 Targets

Affordable housing
Reduce percentage of cost-burdened residents down to 43% from 53%
Development
Build 800 units of affordable housing
Homelessness
Reduce the number of homeless residents by 50%
Complete Streets
Design and implement 20 Complete Streets

Definitions

Severe cost burden
Severe housing cost burden refers to households that spend at least 50% of their income on housing costs.
Jump to: Target indicators Other indicators
Target indicators
Severe housing cost burden by neighborhood, 2015
Source: US Census Bureau, American Community Survey
Severe housing cost burden by tenure, 2015
Source: US Census Bureau, American Community Survey
